https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yrKq1mH6BelPHsqjcDRlWxtgaPr.jpg Errol Morris' "Demon in the Freezer" is a short 17-minute documentary about the stockpiles of the smallpox virus that remain stored for research purposes. Demon in the Freezer
